content.text: ðŸ”¥ It is glad to notice that our research paper:
content.title: Augmenting Continual Learning of Diseases with LLM-Generated Visual Concepts
content.venue: has been accepted by 2025 IEEE International Conference on Bioinformatics and Biomedicine (BIBM 2025)!

content.text: ðŸ”¥ It is glad to notice that our long research paper:
content.title: SQL-R1: Training Natural Language to SQL Reasoning Model By Reinforcement Learning
content.venue: has been accepted by the Main Conference of The 39 Annual Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS 2025)! The model weights and code are available on GitHub and HuggingFace.

content.text: ðŸ”¥ It is glad to notice that survey paper of HKUST(GZ)-DIAL NL2SQL Research Group:
content.title: A Survey of NL2SQL with Large Language Models: Where are we, and where are we going
content.venue: has been accepted by IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering Journal (TKDE 2025)! We have released the related resources (code, data, and paper) in August 2024.

content.text: ðŸŽ‰ Successfully completed my research internship at International Digital Economy Academy (IDEA), Shenzhen. I would like to express my sincere gratitude to all the mentors and colleagues for their guidance and support.
We release a technical study about 0.5B reasoning language models:
content.title: A Technical Study into 0.5B Reasoning Language Models.

content.text: ðŸŽ‰ Successfully pass the M.Phil. Thesis Defense in The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (Guangzhou).
ðŸ”¥ We release a new research about NL2SQL and reinforcement learning:
content.title: SQL-R1: Training Natural Language to SQL Reasoning Model By Reinforcement Learning.
content.venue: The weights and code are available on GitHub in few weeks.

content.text: Receive Intern Program offer and start internship in International Digital Economy Academy (IDEA), Shenzhen.
Successfully pass the Mid-term Group Project Defense of the HKUST(GZ) Red Bird M.Phil Program.

content.title: A Plug-and-Play Natural Language Rewriter for Natural Language to SQL

content.text: Successfully pass the Postgraduate Qualifying Assessment of the HKUST(GZ) Red Bird M.Phil Program.
Start Research Postgraduate Program in The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (Guangzhou).
Receive Postgraduate Program offers from The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (Guangzhou) and The Chinese University of Hong Kong (Shenzhen).

content.title: Development and Validation of a Deep-broad Ensemble Model for Early Detection of Alzheimer's Disease
content.venue: has been accepted and published by Frontiers in Neuroscience.

content.text: Successfully pass the Undergraduate Thesis Defense in Jinan University.
